name: Nez_Perce
text:
Nez Perce
Nez Perce was a Native American tribe of northeastern Washington who once inhabited the Twin Peaks region.
History
"Something is missing. (...) The way, you will find it have something to do with your heritage."
 ―Log Lady
The Nez Perce told legends relating to the White and Black Lodges
 
A manufacturing company bore the name of the tribe.
